subject: Basketball
College Athletics
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: With a 63-49 victory against Miami on Friday in the quarterfinals of the A.C.C. tournament, Virginia Tech made a strong argument for why it belongs in the N.C.A.A. field.
snippet: With a 63-49 victory against Miami on Friday in the quarterfinals of the A.C.C. tournament, Virginia Tech made a strong argument for why it belongs in the N.C.A.A. field.
